TEXT.TITLE: COLORADO VENTURE CAPITAL <COVC> ASSET VALUE UP
TEXT.BODY: Colorado Venture Capital corp said its net asset value rose 215,239 dlrs or two cts per share during the fourth quarter and 175,712 dlrs or two cts per share during the full year 1986. Reuter
